content.raw:
I can't set a material script. Here is my test case:

1. Insert a simple shape
1. Open editor, and assign a new material script name.
1. At this point the material is not assigned to the shape.

Update: I was trying to use a material name that was only available in a model.
content.html:
I can't set a material script. Here is my test case:

  1. Insert a simple shape
  2. Open editor, and assign a new material script name.
  3. At this point the material is not assigned to the shape.

Update: I was trying to use a material name that was only available in a model.
